content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to ask for help in a German clothing store, try on clothes, and ask about sizes. Let's go shopping!

data.tip: The 'sch' sound is like the 'sh' in 'shoe'. Try to stress the second syllable: '-schul-.'

content.text: When you look for a masculine item (`der`), use `einen`. For example: 'Ich suche einen Pullover'.

content.title: Asking for Assistance
content.setting: You are in a clothing store. You see a shop assistant and want to ask for help finding a sweater.

conversation_flow.title: Say you are looking for a blue sweater
State your size (e.g., M)
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ein blauer Pullover. Okay. Welche Größe haben Sie?

extract_info.user_size: Extract the user's clothing size from the message

conversation_flow.title: Acknowledge the assistant
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Größe {user_size}... Einen Moment. Hier, bitte schön.

content.text: To avoid repeating 'der Pullover', you can use the pronoun 'er', which means 'he' or 'it'.
When you ask about a masculine item (`der`), you use `ihn` (him/it). For example: 'Haben Sie ihn in Größe S?'

content.title: Trying it On
content.setting: The assistant has given you a sweater. Now you want to try it on and check the size.

conversation_flow.title: Ask where the fitting rooms are
Say the sweater is too big
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Die Umkleidekabinen sind dort drüben. ... Passt er?

conversation_flow.title: Ask for the sweater in size S
Acknowledge the assistant
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Größe S... Ja, hier. Bitte sehr.

content.text: The verb 'passen' means 'to fit'. You can say 'er passt' for 'it fits'.

data.meaning: I'll take it (for a masculine noun)

content.title: Making the Purchase
content.setting: You've tried on the new size and it fits. You are now ready to buy it.

conversation_flow.title: Say it's perfect and you'll buy it
Ask if you can exchange it
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Die Kasse ist dort vorne. ... *at the checkout* ... Hallo! Das macht 30 Euro.

conversation_flow.title: Say goodbye
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, natürlich. Mit dem Kassenbon. Auf Wiedersehen!
